name: Among The Stars (itch) (Mikrin)
description:
Awaken on your ship, dark and abandoned.

Explore the metal halls in search of tools and clues.

Don't look too long at the sun.

Among The Stars is a first-person adventure game where the player must search through a sprawling abandoned spacecraft to find tools and materials to enable your escape from the empty void and the staring sun. Computer logs throughout the ship may give you a clue to how this situation came to be. Will you escape? Or will you fall prey to the same mystery that could cripple a spaceship?
